title: Leave Me Gasping
description: LEAVE ME GASPING is the first title in a series featuring gutsy female sleuth Del Jakes. A childhood friend is missing and Del travels home to coastal Florida. In a whirlwind of clues and revelations, the sleuth and her cohorts move from a grungy marina grill to a luxurious waterfront enclave; Sound side towns to Gulf side mangrove thickets; suspicion to trust; despair to hopeâ€”and grief to love.
author: T.C. Beacham
